subject: My peanut club
author: SnowfireL@aol.com
full_text:
-------------------------------1249236110
Content-Type: text/plain; charset="US-ASCII"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit

Something funny, I was taking a break for doing house work that rarely gets 
 down, but my new bosses on the Radio (box) aka the brownie gallery or the 
peanut  club, say, "clean up, clean up" and when I came into my room, 
leaving them  to chat amoung themselves, i heard some fella say, "now what's she 
up to?"   It's like having a lot of guests without having to feed them, lol  
love  them all dearly, i so happy i found out about all of you, last i heard 
of this  was long ago, that was a mr meek, i never thought this would 
happen in my day,  this world doesn't know what it's missing.  Have a Happy day 
everyone,  sf
